scenario.name: instant message
scenario.send:
MESSAGE sip:[field0] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "sipp" <sip:[field0]>;tag=[field0] To: "dut" <sip:[field1]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 MESSAGE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: text/plain Content-Length: [len]
hello!
